Panda-MN228



Scratch Resistance

High Flexibility

Ball Drop Impact Resistance


Panda-MN228

An environmentally friendly high-aluminosilicate ultra-thin cover glass, suitable for high-end portable display devices (smartphones, wearable devices, tablets, etc.) as protective glass.

Panda-MN228 Features

● Flexibility

● Bending Strength

● Scratch Resistance

● Impact Resistance

Glass Specification Dimensions

● Produced Thickness: 0.25mm-10.0mm

● Standard Stock Thickness: 0.33/0.4/0.5/0.55/0.6/0.65/0.7/0.75/0.8/0.9

                                  1.0/1.1/1.2/1.3/1.5/1.6/1.8/2.0/2.3/2.5/2.7/2.8/3.0/4.0/5.0/6.0/8.0mm

● Standard Size: 1300×1100 mm (G5) 1850×1500 mm (G6)

       Note: Delivery size can be adjusted according to customer requirements

Glass Performance Data

◆ Mechanical and Electrical Properties

Densityg/cm³2.47±0.03
Thermal Expansion Coefficient×10⁻⁷/℃98.0±2
Softening Point℃830±10
Annealing Point℃606±10
Strain Point℃558±10
Young's ModulusGPa75.6
Shear ModulusGPa30.7
Poisson's Ratio/0.23
Vickers Hardness (after strengthening)HV700
Pencil Hardness/>8H
Volume Resistivitylg(Ω·cm)9.1
Dielectric ConstantF/m8.2


◆ Optical Properties

 　·Refractive Index / 1.51

 　·Photoelastic Coefficient nm/cm/MPa 27.2

 　·Transmittance (see chart below, sample thickness: 0.55 mm)

※ When sample specifications are: 145×73×0.70 mm, the strengthening properties are as follows:

 　　·Four-point bending MPa ≥500 (Recommended ≥600 for 2.5D)

  　　　——Lower span: 40 mm, upper span: 20 mm, compression speed 10mm/min

 　　　·Ball drop performance J ≥0.30

  　　　·Warpage mm ≤0.15

◆ Processing Properties

※ Edge quality affects 4PB and ball drop performance. Therefore, the following parameters are recommended for CNC processing of Panda-MN228 products:

ItemSpindle Speed (rpm)Depth of Cut (mm)Feed Rate (mm/min)Wheel Grit (mesh)
Drilling40000-450000.01-0.02150-200400-450
Hole Expansion40000-45000/100-150400-450
Hole Finishing40000-450000.02-0.04120-1801000-1200
Outer Shape Roughing40000-450000.15-0.25650-800400-450
Outer Shape Finishing40000-450000.05-0.101000-12001000-1200

Note: Wheel runout <0.01mm, adding appropriate concentration (4%-7%) of grinding fluid to cooling water improves edge grinding effect.

◆ Chemical Resistance

ReagentConcentration (%)TimeTemperature (℃)Mass Loss (mg/cm²)
NaOH5%6h95±0.50.75
HCl5%24h95±0.50.12
HF10%20min20±0.517.18


Sichuan Hongke Innovation Technology Co., Ltd. is mainly engaged in the research, development, manufacturing and sales of protective glass for smart terminal displays, special glass for aerospace and new optical materials. It is the first high-tech enterprise in China to simultaneously realize the industrialization of high-alumina cover glass and lithium aluminum silicon cover glass.
